alert.note: Alert for Northern Campbell; Southern Campbell; Western Crook; Weston (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 6:23PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Campbell, Weston and southwestern Crook Counties through 715 PM MDT... At 623 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 2 miles northeast of Echeta to 23 miles south of Moorcroft to 8 miles south of Clareton. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Clareton around 630 PM MDT. This includes Interstate 90 in Wyoming between Mile Markers 110 and 158. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Campbell; Southern Campbell; Western Crook; Weston
